mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.scheme_id AS "scheme.id", ps.name AS "scheme.name", ps.type AS "scheme.type", ps.category AS "scheme.category", a.name AS "name", a.description AS "description", a.priority AS "priority", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mod_proposal_section( id, scheme_id, name, description, priority, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{scheme.id}, #{name}, #{description}, #{priority}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
